BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to members of the fire department who formerly served as police officers.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Members of the fire department who formerly served as police officers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to members of the fire department who formerly served as police officers.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Members of the fire department who formerly served as police officers.
